title: Diddy December 27, 1999, Shooting Incident at Club New York (New York City Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to the following records related to the shooting incident that occurred on December 27, 1999, at Club New York in Manhattan:

1. Any and all police reports, incident reports, or other documents related to the shooting at Club New York on December 27, 1999. This includes reports filed by responding officers and any related correspondence.

2. Records pertaining to the arrest of Shyne (Jamal Barrow) and anyone else involved in the incident, including arrest reports, booking details, and any associated documents.

3. Documentation related to the charges filed against Shyne, Sean "Diddy" Combs, and Jennifer Lopez, including any records of court proceedings or related legal documents.

4. Any witness statements or interviews conducted in connection with the incident.

5.  Internal communications or documents related to media coverage of the incident, if available.

Please provide these records in electronic format if possible. If there are any fees associated with this request, please inform me before processing. If you need additional information to process this request, feel free to contact me at [Your Contact Information].

Thank you for your assistance.

Sincerely,

Cassie Sipe

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Cassie Sipe

title: Diddy December 27, 1999, Shooting Incident at Club New York (Federal Bureau of Investigation)

Sincerely,

Cassie Sipe
